wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
First of all, I'm on your side, so please take this the right way.
Second of all, it's Jon Stewart. And I like him, but he is a COMEDIAN! Hardly the worthy recipient of "major kudos" -- he is merely the flavor of the month. And he is in the media as well. Uh-oh...recursive...
Thirdly, as you correctly say, Moore is not masquerading as the supposedly unbiased evening news. But neither is Limbaugh. Both pretend to be telling you "the truth", but like Stewart, they are primarily ENTERTAINERS, not newsmen.
